#summary Definition of some AOP terms.

Definition mostly derived from [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aspect-oriented_programming].

|| *Term*                || *Definition* ||
|| Advice                 || This is the additional code that you want to apply to your existing model.  ||
|| Aspect                 || The combination of the point-cut and the advice is termed an aspect. ||
|| Join Point            ||    ||
|| Pointcuts            || This is the term given to the point of execution in the application at which cross-cutting concern needs to be applied. ||
